texto: 5.1.1 Overview of the requirements This guidance describes how to perform assessments in such a way that conformance to the requirements can be readily demonstrated. The requirements, set out in clause 4 of ISO/IEC TR 15504-3, for performing a software process assessment are designed to ensure that the results are reliable, consistent and repeatable. This is important where an organization wishes to compare its assessment results with those of other similar organizations. It is especially important in process capability determination in a contractual situation where competing or collaborating suppliers are being compared.
